summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a city road. Initially, a red truck is seen on the right side of the road, and a white car is approaching from the left side. As the vehicle continues, the road becomes clearer with no immediate obstacles. Towards the end, a black SUV suddenly appears from the right side, moving into the self-vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed initially. As the black SUV appears from the right side and moves into the self-vehicles lane, the vehicle decelerates to avoid a potential collision.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A red truck, approximately 10 meters away, parked and partially blocking the view. 2) Left side: A white car, approximately 20 meters away, approaching. 3) Right side: A black SUV, approximately 5 meters away, moving into the self-vehicles lane.

summary: In this segment, the vehicle is approaching an intersection. A black SUV is seen moving from the left side of the frame, crossing the intersection and moving ahead. The SUV maintains a steady speed and does not pose any immediate threat to the observer vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed while approaching the intersection. The vehicle does not need to take any immediate action as the black SUV is moving ahead without causing any obstruction.
key_objects: 1) Left side: A black SUV, approximately 5 meters away, crossing the intersection and moving ahead.
